siteMetadata.title: Osmosis
siteMetadata.subtitle: A science focused podcast hosted by Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris

frontmatter.title: Japan's SLIM Touchdown - Lunar Mysteries Revealed!
frontmatter.description: In Episode 001 of OSMOSISCAST, we embark on an interstellar journey as we dive into the recent news surrounding Japan's SLIM (Smart Lander for Investigating Moon) mission.
